climbs.name: Yellow Belly
climbs.fa: Walt Wehner, Jason Chen, Theo Takeda

content.description: Climb a thin crack in a dihedral, then weird moves to a ledge. Easier cracks lead to the top. Another LONG Western Wall route.
content.protection: Small gear mostly. I don't remember this one that well.
content.location:
Route #2 in the               

Pajarito Gorge Western Wall.   Sorry for the quality. I took a photo of a photo. :(      .

climbs.name: Lucky Luke
climbs.fa: Walt Wehner, Jason Chen, Theo Takeda

content.description: Up the deceptively difficult dihedral, then straight up cracks to the top.
content.location:
Route #3 in the               

Pajarito Gorge Western Wall.   Sorry for the quality. I took a photo of a photo. :(      .

climbs.name: Lunchables Taco Bell Tacos
climbs.fa: Walt Wehner, Jason Chen, Theo Takeda

content.description: A gross name for a gross route. Climb broken crack/face terrain on mediocre rock on the right side of the Western Wall. Might be better if it was cleaned up. Fat chance of that, though, as this crag never sees many visitors.
content.location:
Route #6 in the               

Pajarito Gorge Western Wall.   Sorry for the quality. I took a photo of a photo. :(      .

climbs.name: It's Just Texas Wine (aka Texas Wine)
climbs.fa: Walt Wehner, Jason Chen, Theo Takeda

content.description: Climb a small overhang, then up and left to a broken band, then back right and up cracks to the top. Classic!
content.location:
Route #5 in the               

Pajarito Gorge Western Wall.   Sorry for the quality. I took a photo of a photo. :(      .

climbs.name: Gunsmoke
climbs.fa: Walt Wehner, Jason Chen, Theo Takeda

content.description: Really a variation (but a fun one) on Texas Wine. Climb up to the left of TW for 40 feet, rejoin for 25, then break off left again to finish.
content.location:
Route #4 in the               

Pajarito Gorge Western Wall.   Sorry for the quality. I took a photo of a photo. :(      .

climbs.name: Disco Inferno
climbs.fa: Walt Wehner, Jason Chen, Theo Takeda

content.description: Up a flared crack, work rightwards and up to a ledge, then easier crack climbing to the top.
content.protection: Pro to 2". This could probably use a bolt or two. Or TR it.
content.location:
Farthest left route on the Western Wall. Route #1 in the               

Pajarito Gorge Western Wall.   Sorry for the quality. I took a photo of a photo. :(      .

content.description: The western Wall of Pajarito Gorge is home to approx. 6 climbs.  This side of Pajarito Gorge sees even less traffic than the main (north) wall of Pajarito Gorge.  It is probably shaded from midday through the evening.
